title: Please Help Me About Victorious Ward Skin 2016
body:
Hello Riot Games and Everybody ! 
Im From VietNam and i speak english not good but i will try to let you know my problem 
i get 45 point and get victorious ward skin 2016 . but something problem with my ward skin 
Before seasons end riot post this link on web : 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon 

and when season end i get my reward . thanks so much about that . but something different . not same a picture when riot post on web :( 

this victorious ward skin when season end . please  1 sec look about this victorious ward skin in video and check with riot post victorious ward skin before season end .  Real Diffrerent 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YE2Nhdm5yFk

I just want say it and i hope riot help me :( 

One again. Thank you so much RIOT GAMES and everybody !

replies.body: Your Championship Ward would appear different depending on the points earned with your[ ranked team](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon) matches.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and see how many points you've obtained exactly.  If it's more 30 or more, we'd be happy to upgrade the ward!

i have 45 point . i swear, and that victorious ward skin 2016 , not championship  :( . but that not my mean . can u help me how to post picture on here ? i will show you and you can understand what i mean :( . my victorious ward skin reverse with your ward skin on web . look diffrerent .please help me how to up picture on here ? thanks so much riot
